items.title: UK Watchdog Bans Ads for Prescription Weight-Loss Drugs
items.description: Several companies have been sanctioned for unlawfully advertising prescription-only weight-loss drugs directly to the UK public. Medscape News UK

items.title: Medical Groups’ Suit Seeks to Reverse COVID Vaccine Guidance
items.description: A Health and Human Services spokesman says that the HHS Secretary stands by his decisions. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Overlooking Early Cardiogenic Shock Leads to Poor Outcomes
items.description: When early shock isn’t recognized and treated, it can worsen or lead to death, a hospital-based study shows. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Nighttime Dosing May Provide Better Blood Pressure Control
items.description: Bedtime dosing of antihypertensive medication provided better control of nocturnal blood pressure and improved circadian rhythm without reducing effic...

items.title: Ixekizumab Shows Low Cancer Rates in Inflammatory Diseases
items.description: Long-term treatment with ixekizumab does not increase the incidence of malignant neoplasms in patients with psoriasis, PsA, and axSpA, according to a ...
